activation.title: Activate account

activation.activation_success_message: Your account has been successful active.

user_password_edit.title: Change password
user_password_edit.title_description: After a successful password update, the system will automatically redirect to the login page, use the new password to log in.
user_password_edit.password_rule_description:
- Minimum 8 characters, no maximum length limit
- Include at least 1 lowercase
- 1 capital letter
- 1 digit
- 1 special character (e.g. !@#$%^&*)
user_password_edit.current_password_helper_text: You need to provide your current password to make the password change.
user_password_edit.error_match_message: The new password must be different from the current password
user_password_edit.save_success_message: Your password has been updated sucessful. Sign in again with your new password to continue.

user_notifications.title: Notification

org_welcome.title: Organization
org_welcome.create_org_welcome: Explore transportation management systems by creating a new organization.
org_welcome.create_org_description: You can easily enter information about products, track and manage shipping efficiently. Use the system to build smart shipping schedules that save you time, increase efficiency, and reduce costs. Use data collected from your system to analyze and make smart decisions, helping you improve service quality and optimize your shipping process.
org_welcome.org_list_description: Select a transport company below to continue experiencing and exploring the features of the system.

new_org.title: Create organization
new_org.new_org_title_description: You can easily import cargo information, track shipments, and manage shipping efficiently. Use the system to build smart shipping schedules that save you time, increase efficiency, and reduce costs. Use data collected from your system to analyze and make smart decisions, helping you improve service quality and optimize your shipping process.
new_org.name: Organization name
new_org.contact_description: Information of the legal representative of the organization.
new_org.save_error_existed_user: Each account can only create one organization. If you need to create a new organization, please contact us for assistance.
new_org.notify_active_description: You are currently the owner of the {organizationName} enterprise organization. If you need to create a new organization, please contact us for assistance.
new_org.notify_inactive_description: We've received a request to create a {organizationName} organization from your account. Enterprises are in the process of information moderation and will complete the process as soon as possible. Please wait!
new_org.notify_support: Contact us via hotline or email if you have more questions or need support. Hotline: <hotline></hotline> - Email: <email></email>

waiting.title: Create organization successful
waiting.notify_waiting_description: Congratulations! Your {organizationName} organization has been successful created and is in the process of being validated and activated. Please wait for us to complete the process. Thank you for using our service!

org_setting_general.title: Organization information

org_setting_report.wrong_file_type_error: Please select a file with the following extensions: {types}
org_setting_report.wrong_file_size_error: Please select a file smaller than {size}
org_setting_report.template_description: View and create report templates quickly and easily for each customer, helping you save time, reduce errors, and focus on your core business.
org_setting_report.invoice_download_template: Download the invoice template in the ({types}) format, edit, and re-upload the system for updates.
org_setting_report.driver_salary_download_template: Download the driver salary form in the ({types}) format, edit, and re-upload the system for updates.
org_setting_report.driver_salary_upload_template: Upload a driver's salary statement template
org_setting_report.subcontractor_cost_download_template: Download the subcontractor cost template in the ({types}) format, edit, and re-upload the system for updates.
org_setting_report.accounts_receivable_download_template: Download the customer report template in the ({types}) format, edit, and re-upload the system for updates.

org_setting_report.system_standard_report_template: Standard report template of the system

org_setting_order_code.title: Order code
org_setting_order_code.description: Set up rules for generating automatic order codes in several standard formats, tailored to your management needs. Make it easier for managers, accountants and coordinators to remember, track and manage order information more conveniently.
org_setting_order_code.default_description: Generate a random order code in format A-Z0-9 and a preset length, the default is 10 characters. For example: Order code is ABCDE12345 and Bill of Lading code is ABCDE12345-001, ABCDE12345-002 respectively,...
org_setting_order_code.default_radio_description: The system automatically generates random order code {length} characters [A-Z0-9] in capital letters.
org_setting_order_code.customer_specific_description: The order code is automatically generated based on your customer code. For example: Customer code is XYZ, order code is XYZDE12345 and Bill of Lading code is XYZDE12345-001, XYZDE12345-002 respectively,... Where DE12345 are automatically generated characters.
org_setting_order_code.customer_specific_radio_label: Create order code based on customer code
org_setting_order_code.customer_specific_radio_description: The system automatically generates the order code automatically by combining {customerPrefixLength} the first character of the customer code with a random string [A-Z0-9]
org_setting_order_code.length_helper_text: Enter the order code length from {min} to {max} characters.
org_setting_order_code.route_specific_description: The order code is automatically generated based on your route code. For example: Route code is HG-BC, order code is HG-BCDE12345 and Bill of Lading code is HG-BCDE12345-001, HG-BCDE12345-002 respectively,... Where DE12345 are automatically generated characters.
org_setting_order_code.route_specific_radio_label: Create order code based on route code
org_setting_order_code.route_specific_radio_description: The system automatically generates the order code automatically by combining {routePrefixLength} the first character of the route code with a random string [A-Z0-9]

org_setting_reminder.title: Reminders
org_setting_reminder.description: Setting reminders for expiration dates of vehicle licenses, insurance, and other documents helps to manage and track more effectively.
org_setting_reminder.min_bol_submit_days_description: Minimum number of days to submit documents after completing a transportation trip.
org_setting_reminder.min_vehicle_document_submit_days: Minimum days to remind expiring vehicle licenses
org_setting_reminder.min_vehicle_document_submit_days_descrip: Minimum number of days to remind before expiration of vehicle licenses such as inspection and insurance.

org_setting_others.description: Setting other information helps you customize and manage the system more easily.
